description: This file defines the NotesRepository class, which manages data operations related to notes, such as retrieval, insertion, update, and deletion, using an SQLite database helper. It provides live data observables for all notes and search results, and includes singleton access to ensure a single instance throughout the app.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository class responsible for managing note data using SQLite database,

methods.name: observeAll
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of all notes.

methods.name: observeSearch
methods.description: Returns a LiveData list of notes matching the search query and optional tag.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Suspending function that retrieves a note by its ID.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Suspending function that inserts a new note or updates an existing one, then refreshes the list.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Suspending function that deletes a note by its ID and refreshes the list.

methods.name: refreshAll
methods.description: Private method to refresh the LiveData list of all notes from the database.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Singleton pattern method to obtain the single instance of NotesRepository.
